alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 9:37PM EDT until May 29 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From Friday evening to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Minor overflow of lowlands in the area. At 17.0 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:05 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday evening and continue rising to a crest of 17.2 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
